text: But for the Grace of God or There But for the Grace of God may refer to: *But for the Grace of God (play), by Frederick Lonsdale, 1946–47 *"But for the Grace of God" (song), co-written and recorded by Keith Urban, 2000 *"There But for the Grace of God", an episode of Stargate SG-1 (season 1) *"There but for the grace of God go I", an idiomatic phrase traditionally attributed to John Bradford ==See also== *By the Grace of God (disambiguation)
title: But for the Grace of God
